Reviews.Title: “Honest front desk clerk said breakfast was not any good”
Reviews.Author: LodgerFromChicago
Reviews.Content: ive stayed fine bargain breakfasts subpar refreshing checkin hear front desk clerk fess breakfast eaten elsewhere microtel near pyramids northside indianapolis cluster hotels thankfully cracker barrel nearby breakfast dilemma immediately resolved fine free distance calls color tv mounted atop closet car alarm sunday morning 6 am 90 minutes earlier planned

Reviews.Title: “The room was an ice box”
Reviews.Author: davef908
Reviews.Content: 50 degrees heater waited little heat desk told moved heat sleeping blankets covering clothes shoes complaining main office refunded half cost

Reviews.Title: “THE WORST HOTEL STAY EVER”
Reviews.Author: Laura99IN
Reviews.Content: traveling honeymoon decided pick cheap weve stayed arrival waited 5 minutes counter paid retrieved flipped light bug fly sitting bed 10 minutes mold smell strong strong allergic reaction couldnt breathe asthma attack packed stuff refund kid checked refused money offered argued 30 minutes giving money coughing head thinking im er called cops civil matter probably couldnt guy rude ripping paperwork hands physical fight wasnt eventually allergy pill found wasnt guests lobby saying wasnt wouldnt money mean rude dirty moldy carpet dirty wore shoes bathroom disgusting money wouldve charged bank card microtel stayed holland michigan awesome told friends family shocked stayed usa loved microtel bad name stay microtel recommend horrible

HotelInfo.Name: Motel 6 Pyramid's Indianapolis
HotelInfo.Address: 9140 North Michigan Road, Indianapolis, IN 46268
